author: l_guy
content: Hi, I'm a protocol dev! I've been deeply involved in the Ethereum Protocol Fellowship study group, particularly fascinated by sessions on verkle trees and the statelessness in Ethereum. I'm keen to contribute more actively and learn alongside. I'd love to dive in! tagging <@1010280066028142662> <@774033563732541451> who recently took the session on statelessness and verkle tree in EPFsg, looking forward to engage in further discussion
